short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rewriting your emails with AI to be professional

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to say something, but just don't know how to say it?  Type out your message with every last detail then use PolitePost to rewrite it.  With one click, we fix up your email to make it sound professional, polite, and safe for the work place.

This extension puts a tiny button in each textbox of supported sites.  Just click the button and the text will be rewritten like magic.  Let AI do the thinking for you.

Supported Sites:
- Gmail.com
- Outlook.com
- WhatsApp Web
- Google Messages Web

We use OpenAI's GPT-3 to rewrite your text.  You will need to sign up for an OpenAI account and provide your own API key to use this extension.

IMPORTANT: We are not affiliated with OpenAI.  During signup, OpenAI may require your billing information.



Want to try out AI without signing up for anything?  Test out your emails FREE at PolitePost.net instead!
